hr.header: Voditeljica zbirke:\nMaja Zidarić Pilat, kustosica\nUvid u zbirku: po najavi
hr.content:
Voditeljica zbirke: Maja Zidarić Pilat, kustosica
Zbirka razglednica i čestitki jedna je od nekoliko većih zbirki Muzeja s građom datiranom od posljednjeg desetljeća 19. stoljeća do recentnog doba. Razglednice, originali i manjim dijelom pretisci starih razglednica te čestitke, motivima su raspoređene u sljedeće skupine:
−panorame Pazina
−vedute Pazina (dijelovi grada, ulice, trgovi, gospodarski, školski, vojni i drugi objekti)
−pazinski Kaštel
−Pazinčica, Pazinski potok i poplave
−vedute i panorame mjesta Pazinštine
−istarske narodne nošnje
−sakralni motivi
−spomen-razglednice i prigodne razglednice izdane povodom obilježavanja određenih godišnjica ili obljetnica
−božićne čestitke
−novogodišnje čestitke
−uskrsne čestitke.

Razglednice unutar Zbirke razglednica i čestitki važan su svjedok izgleda i promjena urbanih identiteta, ali i svjedok društveno-ekonomskog razvitka. Važno je napomenuti da je većina nakladnika razglednica i čestitki iz Hrvatske i Italije, a veliki dio razglednica datiranih u prvu polovicu 20. stoljeća, izdavali su i pazinski nakladnici Osmano Giovanni Mazarelli, Josip Novak, Pasquale Zanini, Pasquale Ivich i Angelina Cipola.

en.hero: COLLECTION OF POSTCARDS AND GREETING CARDS
en.header: Collection manager:\nMaja Zidarić Pilat, curator\nCollection insights: upon announcement
en.content:
Collection of Postcards and Greeting Cards is one of several larger Collections of the Museum whose fundus dates in the period between the last decade of the 19th century until recent times. Postcard originals and replicas of older postcards together with greeting cards can be divided into the following groups: 
−panoramas of Pazin (parts of the city, streets, squares, economic facilities, school, military and other objects)
−Pazin Castle
−Pazin Stream (Pazinčica) and the floods
−Panoramas of the surrounding towns and area, 
−traditional Istrian vestments, 
−sacral motives, 
−Commemorative and other occasional postcards issued to mark various anniversaries,
−Christmas greeting cards, 
−New Years' greeting cards
−Easter greeting cards.

Postcards within the Collection of Postcards and Greeting Cards are an important witness of appearance and the changes of urban identities and social-economical development. It is important to denote the fact that the majority of items within the COllection were issued In Croatia and Italy, dating in the first half of the 20th century. Besides that, some of the postcards were issued by publishers from Pazin, such as Osmano Giovanni Mazarelli, Josip Novak, Pasquale Zanini, Pasquale Ivich and Angelina Cipola.
